pkgmetadata.longdescription: # http-tui[![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/http-tui.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/http-tui)[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/http-tui.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/http-tui)![Example Output](https://github.com/treyhunner/http-tui/raw/main/example.svg)## InstallationInstall with pipx (pip works too):```consolepipx install http-tui```To start the app, run:```consolehttp```## License`http-tui` is distributed under the terms of the [MIT](https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT.html) license.
